metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5739 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
The Transformation implementation in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.16,4.4.x before 4.4.15.7, and 4.6.x before 4.6.3 does not use the no-referrerContent Security Policy (CSP) protection mechanism, which makes it easierfor remote attackers to conduct CSRF attacks by reading an authenticationtoken in a Referer header, related to libraries/Header.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5739` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.3-1').
